mapper.select: select terminal_id, city_id, terminal_name, address, tel from terminal where terminal_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into terminal(terminal_id, terminal_name, city_id, address, tel, terminal_status) values (#{terminalId}, #{terminalName}, #{cityId}, #{address}, #{tel}, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT c.company_id AS companyId, c.company_name AS companyName, c.company_tel AS companyTel, b.bus_number AS busNumber, g.grade_name AS gradeName FROM company c LEFT JOIN bus b ON c.company_id = b.company_id LEFT JOIN bus_grade g ON b.grade_id = g.grade_id WHERE c.company_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into company(company_id, company_name, company_tel) values(company_seq.nextval, #{companyName}, #{companyTel})
mapper.select: SELECT r.route_id, r.required_time, r.route_status, ts.terminal_id AS start_terminal_id, ts.terminal_name AS start_terminal_name, te.terminal_id AS end_terminal_id, te.terminal_name AS end_terminal_name FROM route r LEFT OUTER JOIN terminal ts ON r.route_start_id = ts.terminal_id LEFT OUTER JOIN terminal te ON r.route_end_id = te.terminal_id
select terminal_id from terminal where terminal_name = #{terminalName}
mapper.insert: insert into route(route_id, route_start_id, route_end_id, required_time, route_status) values('NAEK123457', #{routeStartTerminal}, #{routeEndTerminal}, to_date(#{requiredTime}, 'HH24:MI'), 1)
mapper.update: update route set route_start_id = #{routeStartTerminal}, route_end_id = #{routeEndTerminal}, required_time = to_date(#{requiredTime}, 'HH24:MI'), route_status = #{routeStatus} where route_id = #{routeId}
